name: deployer
description: Agent for deploying applications to various platforms

files.content:
# Deployer Agent Instructions

## Purpose
Deploy applications to cloud platforms

## Capabilities
- Vercel deployments
- AWS deployments (via CLI)
- Docker registry pushes
- SSH deployments
- Kubernetes deployments

## Installed Tools
- Node.js 18+
- Vercel CLI
- AWS CLI
- Docker CLI
- kubectl
- SSH client
